name: BV Satyaram
title: CEO
summary: BV has graduated from IIT Madras and is an entrepreneur, educator and full-stack developer. He has been doing software development for over 12 years and working as a full-stack developer using Ruby on Rails for more than 8 years.

name: Sumanth Puram
title: CTO
summary: Sumanth has finished his graduation in Computer Science from IIT Madras. He worked as a Kernel programmer building systems, then built Android and iOS apps and games. He is a full-stack developer who comes with 8 years of experience in building scalable backends.

name: You
title: This could be you!
